name: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: 1. Heat butter in a pan. 2. Add onions and cook until golden. 3. Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté. 4. Add tomatoes, cook until soft. 5. Add spices and cook for a minute. 6. Add paneer, cook for 5 minutes. 7. Add cream and kasuri methi, cook for 5 more minutes.
review: Rich and creamy curry with a delightful flavor.

name: Aloo Gobi
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté cumin seeds. 2. Add onions and cook until soft. 3. Add ginger and garlic, cook for 2 minutes. 4. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. 5. Add potatoes, cauliflower, turmeric, and spices. 6. Cover and cook until vegetables are tender.
review: A comforting and flavorful dish that goes well with roti.

name: Thai Red Curry Noodles with Tofu
instructions:
1. Saute garlic, ginger, red chillis in oil
2. Add vegetables
3. Dhaniya, red chilli powder, tumeric, garlic powder
4. Add coconut milk + soy sauce.
5. Tofu air fry with corn flour, everything bagel, salt, garlic powder
6. Add noodles and tofu, toss, and serve
review: Cooked by R. R: (8/10) Loved it. Might swap Hakka noodles with Rice noodles. A: (9/10) Mass!

name: Spice Delight
review: Good food, homely, no kakoos problems. Amazing chapathi. Heard Soya biriyani is good.
